  • Method Details

    • saveCategory

      Category saveCategory(Category category)
      Saves the given Category entity in the data storage.
      Parameters:
      category - The Category object to be saved.
      Returns:
      The saved Category object.

    • findAllCategories

      List<Category> findAllCategories()
      Retrieves a list of all Category entities from the data storage.
      Returns:
      A list of Category objects representing all categories.

    • findCategoryById

      Optional<Category> findCategoryById(Long id)
      Finds a Category entity by its unique id.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique id of the Category to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the found Category, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • deleteCategoryById

      void deleteCategoryById(Long id)
      Deletes a Category entity from the data storage by its unique id.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique id of the Category to be deleted.

    • getCategoryById

      Category getCategoryById(Long id)
      Retrieves a Category entity by its unique id.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique id of the Category to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The Category object if found, or null if not found.
